text: Agdistis hartigi is a moth in the family Pterophoridae. It is known from southern Spain, Italy (Sardinia and Sicily), Greece and Tunisia. The wingspan is about 17 mm.Die palaearktischen Agdistis -Arten (Lepidoptera, Pterophoridae) Adults are on wing from June to July and from September to October.Contribution to the Knowledge of the Pterophoridae from Pantano Longarini (South-Eastern Sicily) ==References== Category:Agdistinae Category:Moths of Europe Category:Moths described in 1973
title: Agdistis hartigi
